name: Short Cut (Beta)
description:
This is "Short Cut", my entry for the jam made in one day with Unity.

PLEASE TRY THE WINDOWS BUILD FOR A BETTER EXPERIENCE (SOME SHADERS ARE NOT WORKING ON THE WEB BUILD) 

You control a little boi that is trying to escape from a weird looking institute.

Good thing though is that you can teleport, which is neat!

CONTROLS

Keys W, A, S, D/Arrow Keys : Move 

Space Key : Jump (You can spam it!)

Maj Key (Hold) : Run

Left Click : Teleport

Right Click : Teleport Back

Time to become the ultimate teleport boi!

MY LATEST VIDEO
